data.event: The county was organized January 23, 1816 and named for Benjamin Howard, the first Governor of the Missouri Territory.

event.title: 1848 revolutions in Germany, many German immigrants also settled

data.event: Following the 1848 revolutions in Germany, many German immigrants also settled in this area.
Due to the reliance on slave labor, in 1860 slaves made up 25 percent or more of the county's population.
